name: QEMU_S_BAT_CHECK_DMR_CACHE_TOPO_CPUID
summary: Verify in QEMU DMR Cache topology by refering CPUID 0x04H leaf, sub-leaf 0 is L1 data cache per core, sub-leaf 1 is instruction cache per core, sub-leaf 2 is unified cache per cluster, sub-leaf 3 is unified cache per die, the case will verify each cache type and level, then verify maximum IDs for CPUs sharing for each level cache, also verify maximum IDs for cores in pkg for each level cache
